definition: to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
way of handling sth/method for making/work method/recipe/practice/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be called/to be known as
to be a guest or visitor
to work with one's hands/manual work/workmanship
to work/to handle matters/to have a job
to conduct oneself/to behave with integrity
to dream/to have a dream/fig. illusion/fantasy/pipe dream
to have something made to order
to make an issue of sth/to fuss/to make a song and dance
to do one's work/to work on sb/to try to persuade sb

sentences.english: What sequela is there after becoming gall-stone operation?
sentences.chinese: 做了胆结石手术后有什么后遗症吗？

sentences.english: “We have done this every June for nineteen years, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 每年逢六月，我们这样做，现已经有十九年了。

sentences.english: The data is processed with pseudosectionof apparent resistivity.
sentences.chinese: 用拟断面图做资料处理解释。

sentences.english: All the female cats wanted to be the cat"s wife."
sentences.chinese: 所有母猫都想做他的夫人。

sentences.english: As the Speaker said, we've got more to do.
sentences.chinese: 正如佩洛西所说的，我们还有许多事情要做。

sentences.english: The educational aim of Huijia School is to "be a great Chinese".
sentences.chinese: 汇佳学校的培养目标是“做一个伟大的中国人”。

sentences.english: Look at my feet, grandma frozen stiff decided to make a pair of cloth padded boots.
sentences.chinese: 看着我冻僵的小脚，奶奶决定给我做一双布棉鞋。

sentences.english: She has done a beautiful thing to me.
sentences.chinese: 她在我身上做的是一件美事。

sentences.english: All the old lady did was quote a scripture to you.
sentences.chinese: 这位剩女所做的就是念了一段经。

sentences.english: The big black Bakelite phone rang at half past ten.
sentences.chinese: 十点半的时候，外壳用胶木做的电话响了。

sentences.english: I lifted my right hand and made scissoring movements with my first two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我抬起右手，用食指和中指做了几个剪东西的动作。

sentences.english: However, even resist to all tin not do it, again He Tan resists.
sentences.chinese: 然而，连抗拒都做不到，又何谈反抗。

sentences.english: But it donot make it any better, what Idid.
sentences.chinese: 但是我做的也好不到哪儿去。

sentences.english: Think about what are people willing to pay for, says Ms. Dunningham.
sentences.chinese: “想想人们愿意出钱做的工作，”坎宁安说。“

sentences.english: I realized then how much work Ault would be for me.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到，在奥尔特我有多少功课要做。

sentences.english: Now you can be the question asker.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以做提问题的人。

definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
